name: Entropy (itch) (Chris Williams)
description:
scroll to play.

this game is a part of a series in which i make 1 prototype a week based on a prompt.

this week's prompt was earth works, which are human-made constructions that modify the land contour. my assigned piece was spiral jetty by robert smithson .

in this prototype i wanted to explore humankind's desire to impose order on the seemingly random and chaotic environment.
